original_definition: 'operational security ranking' means the ranking used by TSOs to monitor the operational security on the basis of the operational security indicators;
generated_definition: 'operational security ranking' means a systematic methodology used to evaluate the effectiveness of security measures and their impact on the organization's operations, in order to prioritize investments and allocate resources accordingly.
